DOC.brief_summary: The objective one week , single group , bilateral , open-label study evaluate product performance Bausch & Lomb daily disposable cosmetic tint contact lens ( Test ) wear daily disposable basis adapt current wearer market opaque tint soft contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Product Performance Daily Disposable Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Subjects must females Chinese descent legal age old 38 . OR subject female Chinese descent least 15 year age less legal age must : parent/legal guardian provide inform consent . Subjects must clear central cornea free anterior segment disorder . Subjects must adapt current wearer market opaque tint soft contact lens , wear lenses two day per week , wear lens eye . Subjects worn gas permeable ( GP ) contact lenses within last 30 day worn polymethylmethacrylate ( PMMA ) lenses within last three month . Subjects systemic disease affect ocular health . Subjects use systemic topical medication , Investigator 's opinion , affect ocular physiology lens performance . Subjects active ocular disease use ocular medication . Subjects scar neovascularization within central 4 mm cornea . Subjects aphakic amblyopic . Subjects corneal surgery ( eg , refractive surgery ) . Subjects currently wear monovision , multifocal , toric contact lens .
